A professional renovation project will enhance its livability, functionality and increase the value of the your property. At the same time, advantage of government grants.
 
Are you looking for a company you can trust to provide high quality, professionally managed design-build, additions, renovations and upgrades? Morton Carpentry is the company you are looking for!

Call us for a free quote today at 905-955-1070!

profile:
Palmeri Construction is a full-service renovation company offering professional and innovative home improvements and repairs in the Greater Toronto Area.  With over 15 years of experience, our team brings quality craftsmanship and reliability to any project we execute.  From interior to exterior renovations, we will work closely with you to turn your house into a home. 

The key to our success is simple â€“ we work with our customers to bring their vision to life and we work hard for our customers to turn their vision into reality. 

We are truly one of a kind and stand out above the rest!!

We are fully licenced and insured; we provide written contracts and back up our work with a 1 year warranty.

We Specialize in all aspects of Interior and exterior residential renovations.

Follow us on twitter to see what projects were currently working on: https://twitter.com/PalmeriCon

profile:
Welcome to NorthWoods Carpentry LTD. At Northwoods Carpentry we are committed to providing the best quality service for all finish carpentry needs in your home.  Whether you have just purchased a new property or would like to make changes to your long-standing home we are here to help you with all of your crown moulding, wainscoting, trim, Wood Wall Paneling, cabinetry and door installation needs with minimal disruptions to your every day life with our quick and mess free installations. 

With the largest among competitors service area stretching over Southern Ontario (including Toronto and the GTA, Barrie, Kitchener, Kingston, Cottage Counties and many more), competitive pricing, extensive experience, top quality results and customer satisfaction as a number one priority we are confident we will match all of the criteria for reliable contractors you can trust in your home. 


Coffered ceiling, Crown Moulding, Wainscoting, Wood Wall Paneling Made of 100 % Solid Real Wood, Trim, cabinetry and door installation.

profile:
Welcome to Kinben Collective. Based in Toronto, Canada, we are a general contracting company built up by a team of skilled tradesmen focused on bringing superb craftsmanship and innovative services & solutions to the architecture & construction industry.Â We are experienced in both residential renovations/remodelling as well as commercial projects!

Brief description of services that we offer:

- Kitchen/Bathroom/Closet renovations, remodelling & installations
- Full residential home improvements and construction renovations
- Window, Door, Crown Molding & Baseboard installations
- Professional-grade Painting services
- Flooring, Tiling, Carpet installation
- Deck/Patio builds & renovation
- Concrete/Masonry, Electrical, Plumbing & HVAC services also are also offered and are serviced to our certified, professional teams

While following Co-Vid 19 restrictions and policies (Social distancing, wearing of masks & gloves, hand sanitizer, etc.), we offer free in-person quotes. As well as over the phone or video calls. Please contact us via e-mail at kinbencollective@gmail.com or you can contact us at (647)-221-6323 for any inquiries or questions!

profile:
We are specialized in the production of fine kitchen cabinets, custom shelving, and high-end closet storage solutions . We are confident in the products we make, as well as the services we provide, on every project will suit your vision.

20 years of experience
Our 20 years of experience led to remodeling any kitchen, wall unit, home office, or walk-in closet style you like

Whether meeting with you and your family or collaborating with architects, contractors, and interior decorators, weâ€™re here to help you define your scope of work and articulate a vision thatâ€™s uniquely yours.


The experienced design team will turn your vision into a reality detailed plan, creating custom solutions that blend form a function to fit all your familyâ€™s needs.

Build
Our designs of combining the old and the new world approach to the top of craftsmanship and that mean you can have the best rich design from both worlds for kitchens or bathrooms. We make every piece of cabinetry in our shop in Toronto, Proudly 100% Canadian-made. To this regard, we offer a warranty against defects in materials and/or workmanship for a period of two years under average residential usage.  

Our Values
We believe in building durable and functional cabinetry that will make things easy to store, easy to find, and easy to clean. By choosing to work with us you will get the real value for your investment and your cabinets will look as good up close as they do from a distance.

profile:
Aaron Fergusonâ€™s passion has always been carpentry. Itâ€™s a craft I learned â€˜on-the-jobâ€™ working for my Fatherâ€™s landscaping company. The first contract was to install cabinets for a general contractor. Word soon spread about the company's work ethic, and our service offering expanded to interior trim, framing and siding. By 2005, we needed to hire full-time employees to help him deliver our services to an ever expanding list of satisfied clients. Our reputation attracted designers and builders of higher-end homes from across Toronto, the GTA and York Region.
Evergreen Carpentry now enjoys a reputation as the go-to option for contractors, builders and homeowners when they want top quality trim and siding products and workmanship. But many things remain the same as when Aaron decided to take that first job:
Work With Passion
Demonstrate Excellence in Execution Service
Safety First Always
